entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023
